flawed_nl_solution:
If Charley bought 30 pencils and lost 6 while moving, she remained with 30-6=<<30-6=27>>27 pencils.
Because she isn't good at keeping track of her pencils, Charley lost 1/3*27 = <<1/3*27=9>>9 more pencils.
She currently has 27-9 = <<27-9=18>>18 pencils.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 27. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
